The Listening Room can provide a number of bespoke services for dedicated record collectors. These include:

Collection building and consultation

We have decades of experience in the classical vinyl market and can advise on how best to grow or sell your collection, areas of investment potential, and new avenues for collecting.

Archival and storage

For major collections, we can provide advice on best practices for the storage and conservation of vinyl and sleeves.

Record consolidation services

For overseas customers, we can receive and condition report records purchased from other sources for consolidated shipment to anywhere in the world.

Wish-list and sourcing

Valued customers can provide lists of works they are looking for, and we will search major collections and dealers to source them, as well as providing first options on rarely available issues.

Valuations and appraisals

Valuations of collections can be given for probate, insurance, or sale.

Cataloguing of your collection

We can travel anywhere in the world to fully catalogue your collection and create an online inventory that only you can access.
